attributes.action: Please reopen the Poulton/Fleetwood railway line
attributes.additional_details: People have petitioned to have this rail line reopened, it was last used for passengers in the 60s/70s and for freight in the 80s/90s, but I think the new but relocated Fleetwood station should be reopened at Fleetwood Freeport next to the Packaged Ice factory, also with Burn Naze/Thornton-Cleveleys stations and a Poulton Curve Line reopened for direct Blackpool services and also Lancaster aswell if the new Burn Naze to Scotforth line is approved.
